mil3.7.15:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.7.15:1.2_0: “Among a person’s knowledge, and the things that mean the same thing, and differ only in the phrasing?”
mil3.7.15:1.3_0: “An consciousness of characteristics, great king, signs, and manifestations of consciousness. Would’t the Soul and the life of that a cloud.”
mil3.7.15:1.4_0: “Having seen with the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind. Whatever sound, hears a sound, hears sounds, smells, tastes, touches, and thoughts with the eye and thoughts?”
mil3.7.15:1.5_0: A senior monk who brought the following:
mil3.7.15:1.6_1: Do you know a thought with your mind, with the ear ... nose ... tongue ... body ...
mil3.7.15:1.8_0: “Well then, great king, is still alive.”
mil3.7.15:3.1_0: The group of fifteen are finished.
